amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-264 states that this bill shall not apply to any lands or waters within the Third Congressional District of Colorado.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-264 states that this bill shall not apply to any lands or waters within the Third Congressional District of Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Curtis amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 240 (Roll no. 605).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
